question: Which one of the following Acts has been made under Article 34 of the Indian Constitution?
option2: The Armed Forces Special Power Act (AFSPA)
answer: The Armed Forces Special Power Act (AFSPA)
explanation: The Armed Forces Special Power Act (AFSPA) has been made under Article 34 of the Indian Constitution while the Army Act, The Border Security Force Act and the Navy Act have been made under Article 33 of the constitution.
